Status: Peachyly Diligent

Oct 6, 2008

I’m deep in the midst of finalizing files for an exhibition and writing a demanding application.  Otherwise, things are good.  School is peachy, if schizophrenic.

“I’m all about adding more evil.” – Orit Halpern, professor of the History of Cybernetics, regarding guilt over being the generation that fought against Microsoft (the same kind of guilt we hope the hippies feel for bringing us the 1970′s).

Currently listening to: Duty Free Technology by Penetration
